name: Alice
message: Great tool, very useful for OSINT tasks!

replies.name: Carol
replies.message: Would love to see more platforms.

name: Dave
message: UI is clean and easy to use.

replies.name: Eve
replies.message: Yeah, the dark mode is nice.

replies.name: Grace
replies.message: Export to PDF works well for me.

name: Heidi
message: Thanks for making this open source!

name: Alice
message: Really impressed with how fast the scan is. Found my profiles everywhere!

replies.name: Bob
replies.message: Same here, the speed is awesome.

name: Charlie
message: Would love to see more platforms supported in the future.

replies.name: Admin
replies.message: Thanks for the suggestion! More platforms are coming soon.

name: Eve
message: The UI is clean and easy to use. Great job!

replies.name: Mallory
replies.message: I agree, dark mode looks great.

name: Trent
message: Export to PDF works perfectly. Can you add Excel export?

replies.name: Admin
replies.message: Excel export is on our roadmap!

name: Peggy
message: Thanks for making this open source. Learned a lot from the code.
